fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Check 3 players and choose one of the roles you saw with your attribute, you will learn if the role is in that group.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are given a role currently in the game at the start of every day, you may not recieve the same role twice.
- If you choose to check an evil role, you must check 4 players.
